event.title: Monitoring & Statistics Night
event.description:
Talks on monitoring and statistical tracking for big and little applications.

- Monitoring and Logging in side projects
   Philip Manavopoulos, Developer at Coull, builder of Doorbell.io

- Sensu at Brightpearl
   Dave Tibbs, Systems Administrator at Brightpearl US 

- Monitoring your application with StatsD and Librato
   Ade Slade, PHP Developer at BaseKit

Brightpearl have kindly offered to sponsor, providing food, beers and their office as the venue. Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.

Afterwards we'll probably go to the pub, somewhere with a beer garden if it's warm!
